participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious about the world, she loves sharing stories from her travels.
participant_1.background: i'm 60years old. i've visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Practical and dependable, he enjoys spending time with his family and following sports.
participant_2.background: i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i own a house in florida. i've a children and a dogs. i am a male. i enjoy american sports.
